content: and knit 14 16 16 16 sts evenly up side of collar 27sts along back and 14 16 16 16 sts down rem side working in the round knit a further 6 row change to 4mm needles and knit a further 7 row next round*k2tog tbl slip worked st back to left ndlpurlwise repeat from * to * until all sts are cast off if you are a tight knitter it may be beneficialto return to using 4 5mm for the cast off round fold the collar in to the reverse of the sweaterand loosely sew down the edge chart a 5 chart b 6 chart c 7 author letters 8 book title letters 9
